column4: I really have not used Evolution that much, preferences I guess, but I know Tbird can do alot of that cross-over mail merge stuff.
I am not trying to merge emails together, but have two seperate accounts.  One is for my personal using another is my working email.
If I disable one of them, Evolution has no issue to unfold the folders.
I never could get a grip on Evolution, looks plain and simple enough, but I use Thunderbird. just a free choice that is available.
